nodes.text: Razian was an alien from whom the Rebel Alliance was buying supplies from on Rion after the Battle of Yavin. Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Chewbacca were sent to negotiate for the supplies. Skywalker successfully struck a bargain with Razian, but discovered that half the credits were missing, as Solo had taken them to enter the Rion Swoop race. Solo was able to win with Skywalker's help, and the latter then took the winnings to give to Razian for the supplies and future commissions.
Razian appears in the story "Swoop Racers", published in the comic Star Wars Adventures 21 on May 8, 2019.
